description: Create a visual dashboard that displays all active integrations, their status, and performance metrics in real-time. This would help users quickly identify issues and optimize their integration workflows.
Implement an AI-powered system that can automatically detect integration failures, diagnose the root cause, and attempt to resolve common issues without human intervention.
Allow users to create and save custom integration templates that can be quickly deployed for similar use cases, reducing setup time for new integrations.
Provide detailed analytics on integration performance, including throughput, latency, error rates, and cost metrics to help users optimize their integration strategies.
Send real-time notifications to users' mobile devices when critical integration events occur, such as failures, performance degradation, or successful completions.
